title: FiveThirtyEight - Wikipedia
snippet: In July 2013, ESPN acquired FiveThirtyEight, hiring Silver as editor-in-chief and a contributor for ESPN.com; the new publication launched on March 17, 2014. Afterwards, the FiveThirtyEight blog covered a broad spectrum of subjects including politics, sports, science, economics, and popular culture.

title: Publishers Daily: ABC News Buys 'FiveThirtyEight'
snippet: FiveThirtyEight was purchased by ESPN in 2013.

title: ABC News acquires FiveThirtyEight - 2018-04-17 - Crunchbase Acquisition Profile
snippet: ABC News acquires FiveThirtyEight on 2018-04-17 for an undisclosed amount

title: FiveThirtyEight joins ABC News - ABC News
snippet: ABC News announced today it has reached an agreement in principle to acquire the renowned data journalism organization FiveThirtyEight from ESPN.
